name: Return of Valkyr
overview: A Spanish language homebrew shooter created by Miguel Ángel aka Jiménez Santana. A remake of the classic MSX 'Valkyr', this game proposes that you must try to annihilate any alien that crosses your path, in the purest 'Phoenix' style. Programmed in AMOS it will give you a complex and addictive play. This game is based on a game called Valkyr that was released for MSX systems.
